wordpressPost.title: What Starting feels like
wordpressPost.content:
Starting anything is scary. Mindbogglingly scary in fact. But somebody’s got to do it and if a 4th grader girl can lob herself off a big ski jump, you can stare down that text editor until it produces some code, a blogpost, a business plan or whatever.

Certainly the best video I’ve seen this month ðŸ™‚
